alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 11:50AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Windham, south central Worcester and northwestern Providence Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1150 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Killingly, or near Plainfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Woonsocket, Plainfield, Smithfield, Killingly, Burrillville, Uxbridge, North Smithfield, Scituate, Glocester, Putnam, Thompson, Sutton, Douglas, Brooklyn, Foster, Sterling and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
